entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.content: 🔥 Airbroke: Lightweight, Airbrake-compatible, PostgreSQL-based Open Source Error Catcher

entry.title: Aarru-jadhav/Employee-Task-Management: This is a lightweight, frontend-only Employee Task Management application that helps teams organize and track tasks efficiently without needing a backend server. Tasks can be created, assigned, and updated by users, with all data stored securely in the browser's localStorage to maintain persistence between sessions.
entry.content: This is a lightweight, frontend-only Employee Task Management application that helps teams organize and track tasks efficiently without needing a backend server. Tasks can be created, assigned, and updated by users, with all data stored securely in the browser's localStorage to maintain persistence between sessions.

entry.title: omarmir/nanote: Lightweight, self-hosted note-taking application with filesystem-based storage so you maintain 100% portability of your notes.
entry.content: Lightweight, self-hosted note-taking application with filesystem-based storage so you maintain 100% portability of your notes.

entry.title: aldhosutra/reqoal: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for request coalescing — merge concurrent identical async calls into a single request to reduce load and improve performance.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript library for request coalescing — merge concurrent identical async calls into a single request to reduce load and improve performance.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...
entry.content: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware...

entry.title: anglscaa/cf-worker-telegram: # cf-worker-telegramA lightweight Cloudflare Worker that serves as a proxy for the Telegram Bot API. 🌐 This tool helps you navigate network restrictions and streamline your Telegram bot applications. 🛠️## Features- Supports all Telegram Bot API methods- Full CORS support for web applications- High performance with Cloudflare's global networ
entry.content: # cf-worker-telegramA lightweight Cloudflare Worker that serves as a proxy for the Telegram Bot API. 🌐 This tool helps you navigate network restrictions and streamline your Telegram bot applications. 🛠️## Features- Supports all Telegram Bot API methods- Full CORS support for web applications- High performance with Cloudflare's global networ

entry.title: luanreis28aa/hycom-api: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
entry.content: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙

entry.title: its-ryyt/Philippines---Javascript-Address-Selector: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.

entry.title: thegamer49520/timeout-typescript: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨
entry.content: A lightweight utility for TypeScript and JavaScript, `@adam-rocska/timeout` creates a Promise that resolves after a set time, perfect for managing delays in your async workflows. Check it out on GitHub for easy integration into your projects! 🐙✨

entry.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
entry.content: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀

entry.title: Vlad345345/bs-progressbar: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility
entry.content: Lightweight JavaScript overlay progress bar as a singleton utility

entry.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
entry.content: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.

entry.title: Pedroltz/TaskProj: A lightweight task management system built with Angular and .NET 9 Web API, featuring Firebase Authentication and a clean UI. Users can register, log in, and manage personal tasks with priority, due date, and status control.
entry.content: A lightweight task management system built with Angular and .NET 9 Web API, featuring Firebase Authentication and a clean UI. Users can register, log in, and manage personal tasks with priority, due date, and status control.
